main event: Four persons stationed at Naval Air Station Adak, Alaska, observed a number of unidentified aerial phenomena hovering over Adak Harbor.
interesting points: The observed objects appeared to be disc-shaped and illuminated with a bright light., The objects maneuvered at high speed and changed direction abruptly., The observation lasted approximately 15 minutes., No sound was heard during the observation., Weather conditions were clear with moderate winds.
witness description: persons stationed at Naval Air Station
